content.en: Transformer optimization: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to optimize the design of power transformers. These algorithms, such as the Improved Fast Evolutionary Programming (IFEP) technique, Genetic Algorithms, and Artificial Neural Networks, are able to find the optimum design for transformers, resulting in improved performance and reduced manufacturing costs. By combining evolutionary algorithms and numerical field computations, researchers have also been able to achieve robust and superior results in transformer design optimization.
content.da: Transformeroptimering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at optimere designet af krafttransformatorer. Disse algoritmer, såsom Improved Fast Evolutionary Programming (IFEP) teknikken, genetiske algoritmer og kunstige neurale netværk, er i stand til at finde det optimale design for transformatorer, hvilket resulterer i forbedret ydeevne og reducerede produktionsomkostninger. Ved at kombinere evolutionære algoritmer og numeriske feltberegninger har forskere også været i stand til at opnå robuste og overlegne resultater inden for transformerdesignoptimering.
